name: MIBA Consulting General System Library
short_description: A collection of cross-platform C++ class libraries. Provides thread, IPC, file, network, SNMP (net-snmp) and Database (MySQL) interfaces. Comes with the usual array of utility classes - smart pointers, singletons, registries, serialization etc.
